name: Luxury Suites
meta_title: Luxury Suites | Keswick Hall in Charlottesville VA
meta_description: Treat yourself to a luxury suite at Keswick Hall in Charlottesville include state of the art amenities, upgraded spaces and sophisticated surroundings. Book now.
short_description: Elevate your experience in the refined residential comforts of our exclusive Luxury Suites. Contemporary and sophisticated in every way, each suite invites relaxation on the plush Duxiana mattresses, elegant Frette sheets and bath linen. Our spa-like bathrooms feature our tailor-made red flower amenity, Dawn Meadow.
description:
Our signature suites offer spacious accommodations with thoughtful touches to make you feel at home. An intelligent Lutron lighting system allows guests to control privacy settings at their leisure. Turn-down service features hand-crafted artisanal chocolates.

Studio King Suite
Our Studio Suites are designed to create a beautiful, refined ambiance with an open space living area.

  • King bed
  • 615-730 sq. ft.
  • Dual marble vanity bathroom with oversized walk-in rain shower
  • In-room safe
  • Mini refrigerator
  • 65” high-definition Smart TV

Estate Suite
Modern luxury meets the Virginia countryside. Our Estate Suites are spacious, individually designed and capture the essence of indulgence and comfort.

  • Separate sitting area with custom furniture
  • King bed
  • 690-1020 sq. ft.
  • Balcony or terrace with outdoor seating
  • Dual marble vanity bathroom with oversized walk-in rain shower
  • In room safe
  • Mini refrigerator
  • 65” high-definition Smart TV
  • Some suites offer a separate soaking tub
  • Electronic window solar shades

Presidential Suite
Our largest signature suite offers residential solace along with a lavishly appointed master bedroom and separate living and dining areas. Benefits include a private entrance along with a private balcony with sprawling mountain views.

  • 750 sq. ft., King-sized bedroom
  • 840 sq. ft. of living space
  • Dual marble vanity bathroom with oversize walk-in rain shower
  • In-room safe
  • Full wet bar with wine fridge
  • 65” high-definition Smart TV
  • Separate soaking tub
  • Additional half bathroom
  • Electronic window solar shades
  • Walk-in closet
  • Designer kitchenette and wet bar with Viking Appliances
  • 75” flat screen Smart TV
  • Gas fireplace
  • A Connecting Deluxe King room available, 700 sq. ft.

Hotel Accessibility
Completely updated in 2020, Keswick Hall is compliant with the Department of Justice 2010 ADA Standards for Accessible Design. Accessible rooms are available and we welcome guests of all abilities. Our property descriptions aim to allow any visitor to make an informed decision on whether the hotel is an appropriate choice for their needs. We also invite you to view our Accessibility Statement.
